description:
Perfectly orientated with a north/south aspect and exceptional elevation, this exquisite residence has been designed to maximise natural light, beautiful breezes and mesmerising vistas across Whites Hill Reserve.

Less than four years old, the home was purpose-built to create phenomenal family living and effortless indoor/outdoor integration. Fantastic separation is provided with living zones, entertaining spaces and bedrooms on both floors, making the layout well-suited to families with teenagers.

Ascend to the upper level, hosting a lounge, dining area, and a glass-framed balcony harnessing full views over Whites Hill. An enchanting backdrop of greenery and hillside homes, this southerly aspect forges a wonderful sense of connection with the natural landscape.

Enjoy the scenic outlooks while preparing meals in the open-plan kitchen featuring spectacular storage. A waterfall stone island forms a stylish centrepiece and is accompanied by a butler's pantry, soft-close drawers, a Vintec wine fridge and Bosch appliances.

The views continue in the downstairs rumpus/living area, which flows to an alfresco patio, timber deck, and saltwater swimming pool with a tranquil water feature. The perfect entertainer's retreat or kid's living space, families will love the privacy and room to swim, lounge and BBQ.

The north-facing master retreat, a study nook and a powder room reside upstairs, while a family bathroom and three kids' bedrooms are positioned on the ground floor.

Additional property highlights:
- Timber floors across the living spaces and 2.7-metre ceilings throughout
- Bosch oven, microwave oven, cooktop, plate warmer and integrated dishwasher
- Master suite with a north-facing balcony, walk-in robe and ensuite
- Three children's bedrooms downstairs with built-in robes and plantation shutters
- Both bathrooms include stonetop vanities, matte black fixtures and large showers
- Laundry featuring outdoor access and great storage
- Double garage with epoxy floors and storage; electric front gate
- Fujitsu ducted air-conditioning; ducted vacuum; 6.6kW solar system
- Fly screens to sliders and louvres; security screens to downstairs bedrooms

Situated in a quiet street surrounded by quality builds, this residence offers families a blue-chip lifestyle in an esteemed suburb. Camp Hill State Infants and Primary School is 350m away, and you are moments from childcare, Camp Hill Kindergarten, Churchie, Villanova and Loretto. Enjoy afternoons at the local parks and playgrounds and share meals with friends at Camp Hill Marketplace and Martha Street. City bus stops are 180m away on Old Cleveland Road, and the CBD is just 12 minutes from your door.

Rental Appraisal: $1,500 - $1,600 per week.
Council Rates: $595.74 per quarter excl. water/sewer
